W15_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W15_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You found a world choked by stagnant air on the other side of the door. This place is clearly already in the grasp of darkness, and you cannot wait to explore it in full.

W15_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W15_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: Your work in this world is done. It's time to depart.

W15_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W15_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_DETAIL.text: Someone captivating is in this area.
